open_ended.Q7_most_significant_benefit: Gives students practical opportunities to come to understand one of the fundamental aspects of algorithms
open_ended.Q8_most_significant_drawback: I thought the timeout was a little too fast; the plotting was confusing -- see my botched attempts! :-)  Also, for, say, a linear-time algorithm would I have got correct marks if I plotted f(n)=20n?  I didn't even get that far but the examples seemed to assume a constant of C=1.  That's being extremely nit-picky :-).
